item.title: 三八妇女节快乐
item.description: 致敬每一个她
item.content:encoded:
2025-03-08 20:58 广东

致敬每一个她

妇 女 节 快 乐

Happy Woman's Day


国际劳动妇女节

（International Women's Day）

是在每年的3月8日为庆祝妇女在经济、

政治和社会等领域作出的重要贡献

和取得的巨大成就而设立的节日。



打破偏见绽放真我

在时代的浪潮中，女性从来不是被定义的配角。从职场的拼搏奋进，到家庭的温暖守护，从科研的创新突破，到艺术的灵感迸发，女性的力量无处不在。

38 妇女节，是对女性的礼赞，更是对女性无畏前行的歌颂。不要被外界的声音束缚，拒绝“应该这样”的刻板印象。去追求热爱，去探索未知，去成为自己想成为的任何人。

愿每一位女性都能勇敢打破偏见，在属于自己的天空中，绽放最耀眼的光。



女性力量生生不息


当我们谈及女性，总能想到温柔、坚韧、细腻这些美好的词汇。但女性的魅力远不止于此，她们是生活的艺术家，用智慧和爱勾勒日常的色彩。

在妇女节这个特殊的日子里，回顾那些为梦想全力以赴的瞬间，那些在困境中坚守的时刻，我们看到了女性力量的磅礴。无论是初入职场的青涩，还是历经岁月的成熟，女性始终以独特的姿态书写人生。

这一天，让我们致敬每一位努力生活的女性，愿未来的日子，继续怀揣希望，奔赴热爱，让女性力量生生不息 。



致独一无二的她

世界因为有了女性，而格外多彩。她们是女儿，是母亲，是妻子，更是她们自己。在成长的路上，女性不断蜕变，用勇气和坚持诠释着生命的意义。

38 妇女节，是专属女性的节日。放下忙碌，停下脚步，好好宠爱自己。欣赏自己的每一次进步，接纳自己的不完美。因为，你就是独一无二的存在，值得世间所有的美好。

在这个美好的节日里，愿每一位女性都能收获满满的幸福，绽放出属于自己的芳华 。



妇

女

节


International Women's Day

It is celebrated on March 8 every year to celebrate women in the economy,

Important contributions in the political and social fields

And made great achievements and set up the festival.



Women's Power: Breaking Biases, Shining Authenticity
In the tides of time, women are never defined roles. From workplace perseverance to family warmth, from scientific breakthroughs to artistic inspiration, women's power is omnipresent.

On this Women's Day, we celebrate not just achievements but the fearless journey forward. Break free from "should-be" stereotypes. Pursue passions, explore unknowns, and become whoever you aspire to be.
May every woman shatter biases and radiate her brightest light.

The Eternal Pulse of Feminine Strength

Words like tenderness, resilience, and grace only begin to describe women. They are life's artists, painting daily hues with wisdom and love.

This Women's Day, we honor moments of chasing dreams and weathering storms. Whether navigating career beginnings or embracing life's maturity, women script their stories with unparalleled grace.
Here's to every woman shaping her world – may this strength flow eternally.

To the One and Only Her

Women – daughters, mothers, partners, but above all, themselves – color the world with courage and evolution.

On this special day, pause and cherish yourself. Celebrate progress, embrace imperfections. You are irreplaceable, deserving of all life's beauty.
May every woman bloom in her own unique brilliance.





END




-暨南大学国际学院融媒体中心-

-----THE END-----

item.title: 2024! 国际学院学生干部联欢会
item.description: 第一届国际学院学生干部联欢会圆满成功！！！！！
item.content:encoded:
2025-01-20 14:38 广东

第一届国际学院学生干部联欢会圆满成功！！！！！


为促进不同学生组织间的相互交流和友好协作，我院于2024年12月26日19：00，在石牌校区第二文科楼三楼阳台，举办了2024年度国际学院学生干部联欢会。


联欢会邀请了国际学院学工办老师们一同参与，余佳佳老师，封小龙老师分别进行了年度工作总结发言以及未来展望，同时对学生骨干们一年的辛苦工作表示鼓励。



在活动正式阶段，依次开展由不同学生部门带来的游戏活动，使同学们参与进来活跃气氛。首先是由国际学院团委组织部与融媒体中心一同设计的游戏--猜歌名挑战。在音乐的烘托和激烈的抢答下，活动渐渐走向高潮，使全员有了深度参与感，同时答题正确后的小奖品也使大家的积极性逐渐提高。


第二个游戏是由国际学院团委社会实践部带来的游戏--你画我猜、猜字谜。学生被分成不同的小组，依次进行词语展示和猜测，在此过程中学生之间深入加强协作与配合，同时也增强互相的认知与理解。

第三个游戏是由国际学院学生会综合事务部设计的游戏--简笔画速记大挑战。在这个游戏中，全员被分成几个小组同时参与绘画与竞答，不同的图像呈现和理解极大增强活动的趣味性、娱乐性。



活动的最后一项为抽奖环节。国际学院学工办老师们为大家准备丰厚的奖品，包括一等奖拍立得与电子书、二等奖电动牙刷、三等奖华为手环、优胜奖卡皮巴拉文具大礼包等。全体学生骨干参与随机抽奖，并领取对应奖品，以此鼓励和嘉奖一年的辛苦工作。

2025年已经到来！希望通过此次新年师生联欢会，使学生骨干们在工作之余更好交流与放松，为2024年画上圆满的句号，以最崭新的姿态迎接新一年的更多挑战！


In order to promote mutual exchanges and friendly cooperation among different student organizations, the College held the 2024 International College Student Leader Party on the balcony of the third floor of the Second Science Building of Shipai Campus at 19:00 on December 26, 2024.

The party was mainly for the International College Youth League Committee, Student Union, Student Committee and other major student organizations, invited a total of 28 students to participate in the party, for everyone in the busy study and student work to provide a platform to promote mutual understanding and show themselves.

The year 2025 has arrived! I hope that through this New Year's party, the backbone students can better communicate and relax after work, draw a successful end to 2024, and meet more challenges in the New Year with the most new attitude!



-END-


-国际学院融媒体中心-

item.content:encoded:
2024-12-23 20:20 广东

暨南逐风日赛场竞芳华暨南大学第五十届田径运动会运动会快讯 11月21至23日暨南大学第五十届田径运动在石牌校

暨南逐风日

赛场竞芳华

暨南大学第五十届田径运动会


运动会快讯



11月21至23日暨南大学第五十届田径运动在石牌校区举办。每一次起跑都凝聚着青春和希望，每一次跳跃都挑战着自己的潜能。跟随我们的镜头一起走进这场体育的狂欢感受运动精神的无限魅力！


运动会开幕式




21日下午，暨南大学第五十届田径运动会正式拉开帷幕。伴随着国旗护卫队、校旗护卫队的入场，校运会正式开启。备受瞩目的方阵展演也如约而至。快看！斗志昂扬的国际学院方阵出场！国际风采，团结一心，青春飞扬，共创未来！方阵中，学院师生呐喊着整齐的口号，步伐整齐，口号响亮，展现他们运动员的必胜的决心。


师者亦豪情，赛场展锋芒


国际学院教工队伍团队协作、默契配合积极参加投篮、跳大绳、飞盘、踢毽子赛道接力跑、足球绕杆射门等项目，教职工们也体验到了运动的快乐。

生命在于运动

Sports


承暨南之精神！扬暨南之风采！


运动会高光时刻

国际学院在本次运动会中展现了“友谊第一，比赛第二”的竞技精神；“赛出风格，赛出精彩”的运动精神。他们挥洒汗水，用实际行动秀出昂扬的青春活力。

左右滑动查看更多


这场田径运动会不只是一场速度与力量的较量，更是团结与梦想的闪耀时刻！国际学院学子展现了非凡的竞技水平和团结友爱的精神面貌，收获了令人瞩目的成绩获得10余项奖项！ 



果园荣誉

学生男子团队荣获第七名


欧英翰荣获铅球第二名和标枪第三名 


周晔、潘俏伊、方楚群、黄筑瓴四人团队荣获4x200米混合接力第八名


黄筑瓴荣获100m跨栏第七名


雷子桐荣获体测个人总分第二名50米跑、800米跑、立定跳远单项第一名 


杨梓榆荣获100米跨栏第五名 


仇俊椉荣获标枪第二名 


杨慧敏荣获百米定向第八名 


林贻桥荣获百米定向第五名 


甘心湉荣获跳高第五名

学子奋勇争先，共铸暨南荣光



本届校运会已经落幕，但精彩永不散场。国院的运动健儿们：你们永远是国际学院的骄傲！感谢每一位参与者的热情投入，是你们的努力与坚持赋予了这段旅程闪耀不凡的意义。让我们带着这份爱和力量继续前行，在未来的日子里创造更多属于我们的荣耀！国际风采，团结一心，青春飞扬，共创未来！

From Nov. 21 - 23, the 50th Track and Field Games of Jinan Univ. was held at Shipai Campus. Athletes from multiple campuses gathered to compete. The event commenced on the 21st afternoon with the entry of flag guards. The International College's faculty and staff participated in various sports activities, promoting the university spirit. The college's students, adhering to "friendship first, competition second", achieved remarkable results with over 10 awards, showing high competitiveness and unity. Despite the games' end, the enthusiasm persists. The International College thanks all participants and will strive for more glories with its unique features and unity.


—暨南大学国际学院融媒体中心—


— THE END —

item.title: 二十四节气——冬至
item.description: 冬至雪落十一月廿一Winter solstice snow fall“阴极之至，阳气始生，日南至，日短之至”
item.content:encoded:
2024-12-21 15:28 广东

冬至雪落十一月廿一Winter solstice snow fall“阴极之至，阳气始生，日南至，日短之至”









十一月廿一

Winter solstice snow fall



“阴极之至，阳气始生，日南至，日短之至，日影长之至，故曰冬至。”当这一天来临，岁末的气息愈发浓郁，南北各地也开启了各具特色的冬至庆典。


冬至大如年

北方·吃饺子


   在北方，冬至的热闹藏在饺子的褶纹里。一家人围坐，和面、剁馅，包出饱满的饺子，一口下去，暖了肠胃，热了心窝。这习俗传说是为了防止耳朵被冻掉，于是饺子成了冬日的护耳佳肴，寄寓着健康平安的祈愿。


江南 · 吃汤圆


   而南方，冬至是汤圆的主场。糯米粉团裹着甜润的芝麻、花生馅，或煮或炸。吃汤圆寓意着团圆美满，阖家幸福，在这最长的寒夜，为生活添一份甜蜜。

   除了食俗，南北庆祝方式也各有千秋。北方一些地区会举行庄重的祭天祭祖仪式，传承着对先人的追思与家族的荣耀；南方则流行绘制“九九消寒图”，人们在一笔一划中，数着日子盼春归，让漫长的冬日多了份诗意与闲适。

   冬至的南北习俗，虽形式各异，却都饱含着对生活的热爱和对未来的憧憬，凝聚着中华儿女共通的文化情怀，代代相传，熠熠生辉。


When the cathode reaches its extreme point and the yang qi begins to arise, the sun reaches its southernmost position, the day is at its shortest and the shadow is at its longest. Hence, it is called the Winter Solstice.

 

In the north, the liveliness of the Winter Solstice lies in the folds of dumplings.  Legend has it that this custom is to prevent ears from being frozen off.  In the south,sweet dumplings take center stage on the Winter Solstice.Eating sweet dumplings symbolizes reunion and happiness . 

 

Besides the food customs, the ways of celebration in the north and the south also vary. In some areas in the north, solemn rituals of offering sacrifices to heaven and ancestors are held. In the south, it is popular to draw the "Nine-nine Cold-Dispelling Pictures". 

 

Although the customs of the Winter Solstice in the north and the south are different in form, they all embody the love for life and the longing for the future.


 -END-

   -暨南大学国际学院融媒体中心-

item.content:encoded:
2024-12-20 22:12 广东

澳门回归25周年|“莲”开盛放，续写辉煌








澳门

回归


25周年

congratulation！



1999年12月20日零时，澳门回归，这一历史性的瞬间永远镌刻在中华儿女的心中。在澳门文化中心的庄重场馆内，《义勇军进行曲》奏响，国旗与区旗同升，澳门历经近500年漂泊终回祖国。自1553年葡萄牙入居澳门以来，澳门的回归之路充满了中华儿女的期盼与不懈努力，它不仅象征着中国终结了西方在中国的殖民历史，更是亚洲解放史上的一个重要里程碑，书写了亚洲解放史的新篇章。


澳门回归日

1

1999年12月20日零时，澳门回归，这一历史性的瞬间永远镌刻在中华儿女的心中。在澳门文化中心的庄重场馆内，《义勇军进行曲》奏响，国旗与区旗同升，澳门历经近500年漂泊终回祖国。

2

自1553年葡萄牙入居澳门以来，澳门的回归之路充满了中华儿女的期盼与不懈努力，它不仅象征着中国终结了西方在中国的殖民历史，更是亚洲解放史上的一个重要里程碑，书写了亚洲解放史的新篇章。


澳门回归之于暨南大学

在中央政府的大力支持下，澳门的治理体系日益完善，经济发展迅速，社会和谐稳定。澳门人民在新的征程上，正以饱满的热情和坚定的信心，书写着属于自己的辉煌篇章，向全世界展示了“一国两制”这一伟大创举的蓬勃生命力与无限魅力。


2024年12月20日，澳门迎来回归祖国25周年。25年来素有“华侨最高学府”美誉的暨南大学为澳门持续输送人才，成为名副其实的“澳门人才库”。澳门暨南人爱国爱澳，坚定拥护“一国两制”，他们是粤港澳大湾区交流的纽带，是暨南的骄傲。


国际学院坚持“宏教泽而系侨情”的办学使命，贯彻“面向海内外，面向港澳台”的办学方针，按照国际化办学的理念和标准，开办全英语授课专业，为澳门同学提供一个全方位、高品质的学习与交流平台。




澳门回归之于国际学院

2018年 应暨南大学澳门校友会会长马有恒先生之邀，暨南大学洪岸副校长率领“暨南大学2017年优秀学生访澳团”交流访问，我院2013级金融学学子邝杰新作为优秀学生代表受邀参加。


2019年 国际学院临床医学2019级新生欧阳泳恩，放弃华盛顿大学学位，选择来到暨南大学国际学院修读临床医学。

“很多人觉得我放弃在美国的学位、放弃能在澳门本地读书机会而选择暨大是退而求其次的决定，我并不这么认为。我觉得人生是要靠自己走出来的，我想成为一名医生，暨大的临床医学也有很多优秀的人，他们也是我努力前进的方向。”

“暨大是人生的另外一个起点，我们还可以去改变很多事情，最重要的是要有自己的思想，要把握好自己做出的每个决定。”


2019年 孙健荣，暨南大学国际学院药学专业2017级学生，港澳台侨复合型人才培养计划成员，第十二届全国大学生药苑论坛创新成果一等奖和优秀论文奖获得者。在校期间，他曾获港澳台侨奖学金一等奖，并积极参加活动，多次获奖。  


2022年 国际学院港澳台侨学生学习能力提升计划邀请澳门校友2017级计算机科学与技术专业李家辉，参加2022级新生第一次班会，为同学们带来个人成长方向、行业的发展前景的分享。




澳门回归之于澳门学子

信息科学技术学院软件工程专业的澳门学子许铭睿

谈及在暨南大学的学习体验与澳门教育的差异，他分享道：“澳门的教育注重开放性思维，例如高中暑假作业倾向于实地考察、制作报告等多元形式，旨在激发学生的创造力；而内地的教育方式在提升思维能力和做题实力方面成效显著，两者各有千秋，都让我受益匪浅。”

展望未来 25 年，许铭睿满怀期待地说：“希望澳门能够成功突破经济单一化的困境，实现多元开放发展，吸引更多人才，进一步提升教育水平，让经济腾飞，人民生活水平蒸蒸日上，在大湾区建设中绽放更加耀眼的光芒。”

\ | /

★


国际学院临床医学专业的澳门学子梁晓日

在融入内地学习生活方面，学校举办的活动让梁晓日收获颇丰。他提到：“10月份的时候，学校邀请澳门卫生局举办过关于医疗就业的讲座，为我们澳门医学生提供了就业和继续学习的方向引导，对我融入内地学习和生活挺有帮助的。”

对于粤港澳大湾区建设，梁晓日有着自己的见解：“我觉得澳门在粤港澳大湾区建设中扮演着对外窗口的角色，毕竟它曾是东西方文化交流的前沿阵地，有着独特的文化交融优势，能为大湾区建设增添助力。”


The Returning Anniversary of Macao

1

At midnight on December 20, 1999, Macao returned to China, a historic moment forever engraved in the hearts of the Chinese people. In the solemn venue of the Macao Cultural Center, the "March of the Volunteers" was played, and the national flag and the regional flag were raised together. Macao finally returned to the motherland after nearly 500 years of separation. 

2

Since Portugal occupied Macao in 1553, the journey of Macao's return has been filled with the expectations and unremitting efforts of the Chinese people. This not only symbolizes the end of the Western colonial rule in China but also represents an important milestone in the history of Asian liberation, opening a new chapter in the history of Asian liberation.




With the strong support of the central government, Macao's governance system has become increasingly perfect, its economy has developed rapidly, and its society is harmonious and stable. On the new journey, the people of Macao are writing a glorious chapter of their own with full enthusiasm and firm confidence, demonstrating to the world the vitality and infinite charm of the great initiative of "one country, two systems".

On December 20, 2024, Macao will commemorate the 25th anniversary of its return to the motherland. Over the past 25 years, Jinan University, renowned as the "premier institution of overseas Chinese education," has consistently supplied talent to Macao, thereby establishing itself as a genuine "talent pool for Macao." The Jinan community in Macao demonstrates unwavering patriotism and support for the "one country, two systems" principle. They serve as a vital bridge for exchanges within the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and are a source of pride for Jinan.

 The International College is committed to the mission of "educating and nurturing overseas Chinese" and upholds the educational policy of "serving both domestic and international communities, including Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan." In alignment with international educational philosophies and standards, the college offers English-medium programs, thereby furnishing Macao students with a comprehensive and high-quality platform for learning and cultural exchange.



END


-暨南大学国际学院融媒体中心-


-----THE END-----

item.title: 品茗传千里，茶韵汉语情 | Chinese Corner
item.content:encoded:
2024-12-20 22:12 广东

2024年12月7日上午，国际学院汉语角暨中国茶文化活动“茶香千年·韵传四海”在番禺校区西操场顺利举行。此次汉语角主题以茶文化为主线，活动形式为文化活动展示及品茗盏香游园摊位巡展，融合品茗、赏戏、享文化开展嘉年华式的活动。国际学院党委书记闫昕、党委副书记宋京松、办公室主任孙绮芸等领导以及十余位教职工、各专业年级的学生们共同参与了本次活动。



01


汉语角活动伊始，国际学院党委书记闫昕致辞。他表示，国际学院打造的Chinese Corner和English Evening是学院非常好的文化交流平台，有利于国院学子讲好中国故事，传播中国声音；同时，本次文化活动也是是国际学院贯彻落实习近平总书记关于把中华优秀传统文化传播到五洲四海这一任务的具体实践。

✦

闫昕书记致辞

✦



02


接着，文化活动展示环节由舞蹈Whiplash拉开了帷幕。动听的音乐瞬间点燃了观众们的热情，赢得阵阵喝彩。本场文化表演内容丰富：既有《多远都要在一起》、《保留》等悠扬的歌声、又有《武旦》等曼妙的舞姿、有由五柳弦琴带来的《故土情愫》、有电吉他及古筝中西合奏的《权御天下》。在表演的最后，一首嘹亮的《海阔天空》则是点燃了全场的气氛，为在场的观众带来了一场视听享受。


✦

•

✦

✦

同学们的精彩表演

✦


03


文化活动表演结束后，来自国际学院24级的八个专业组成的茶文化摊位展示环节正式开始。本场茶文化展示不仅包含了中国传统的六大茶系：黑茶、黄茶、绿茶、青茶、红茶以及白茶，还别出心裁地加入了中式茶点和新式茶饮，向在场的嘉宾和同学们展示了一场传统与新潮交替、文化与茶香共融的茶文化盛宴。





04


经过激烈的角逐后，24级临床医学专业与24级食品科学与工程专业的摊位在众多摊位中中出类拔萃，荣获此次活动一等奖。会计学、金融学、国际新闻与传播专业的摊位，荣获此次活动二等奖。药学、计算机科学与技术、国际经济与贸易专业的摊位，荣获此次活动三等奖。



本次国际学院汉语角活动在热烈的掌声中圆满落幕。“茶香千年 韵传四海”，希望国院学子携手并进，传承中华民族传统文化，为将中华优秀传统文化传播到五洲四海贡献自己的力量。活动最后，参加活动全体师生进行了合影留念，以此纪念这一次成功的活动。


✦

老师同学们合影留念

✦

On the morning of December 7, 2024, the Chinese Corner of the International  School and the Chinese Tea Culture Activity titled "The Millennium-long Fragrance of Tea, Spreading Its Charm across the World" were successfully held on the west playground of Panyu Campus. Yan Xin, the Party Secretary of the International School, Song Jingsong, the Deputy Party Secretary, Sun Qiyun, the Director of the Office, as well as more than ten faculty members and students attended this event together.   The theme of this year's Chinese Corner is Chinese tea culture, and the activity was in the form of a large garden party with booths and performance activities, integrating tea-tasting, opera appreciation and cultural enjoyment to carry out a carnival-style event. It aimed to let students experience the rich and colorful cultural content of the Chinese nation and enhance the class cohesion and sense of responsibility among students.  



01


At the beginning of the Chinese Corner activity, Yan Xin, the Party Secretary of the International School, delivered a speech. He said that the Chinese Corner and English Evening created by the International School are two excellent cultural exchange platforms, and the Chinese Corner of the International School is a practice for the International School to implement General Secretary Xi Jinping's task of spreading excellent traditional Chinese culture to all corners of the world.  



02


The wonderful performances by students kicked off this Chinese Corner. The beautiful music instantly ignited the enthusiasm of the audience and won bursts of applause. The content of this cultural performance was rich: there were not only melodious songs such as "Stay Together" and "Retain", but also graceful dances like "Wu Dan" and "Whiplash", and even the performance of "Hometown Sentiment" by Wu Liu String Instrument and the Chinese and Western ensemble of "All Hail the King" with electric guitar and guzheng. At the end of the performance, a loud and clear "Boundless Oceans, Vast Skies" lit up the atmosphere of the whole venue, bringing an audio-visual enjoyment to the audience present.  



03


After the song and dance performances, the display session of tea culture booths composed of eight majors of the 2024 grade of the International School officially began. This tea culture display not only included the six traditional Chinese tea categories: dark tea, yellow tea, green tea, oolong tea, black tea and white tea, but also ingeniously added Chinese-style pastries and new-style tea drinks, presenting a tea culture feast where tradition and fashion alternated and culture and tea fragrance blended to the guests and students present.  



04


After fierce competition, the booths of the 2024 grade Clinical Medicine major and the 2024 grade Food Science and Engineering major stood out among numerous booths and won the first prize of this activity. During the awarding session, the audience present gave them applause and support. The booths of Accounting, Finance, and International Journalism and Communication majors won the second prize of this activity. And the booths of Pharmacy, Computer Science and Technology, and International Economics and Trade majors won the third prize of this activity.  


This Chinese Corner activity of the International School came to a successful conclusion in warm applause. "The Millennium-long Fragrance of Tea, Spreading Its Charm across the World". It is hoped that the students of the International School will go hand in hand, inherit the traditional culture of the Chinese nation, and contribute their own strength to spreading excellent traditional Chinese culture to all corners of the world. At the end of the activity, all the teachers and students who participated in the activity took a group photo to commemorate this successful event.


-国际学院融媒体中心-

- - - end - - -


✎  今日

item.content:encoded:
2024-12-11 18:15 广东

第24届国际学院团委学生会成立大会

第24届

国际学院团委学生会

成立大会


2024年11月19日下午，第24届国际学院团委学生会成立大会在暨南大学番禺校区教学楼N305隆重举行。国际学院党委副书记宋京松，国际学院学工办辅导员余佳佳、尹秋颖、杨璐瑶、李晓倩，国际学院团委学生会指导老师封小龙，国际学院学生代表团、国际学院团委学生会主席团、各部门负责人以及全体新生干事出席了本次成立大会。


全体共唱校歌



领导讲话


宋京松强调，学生会作为青年组织，应该承担起更多的责任，不仅要注重历练，还要重视学业，做好本职工作。在学生会建设方面，应该多“走出去”，积极向外界学习，发挥校友资源，增进交流，寻找解决问题的方法。国际学院学生会也应该向优秀的榜样学习，坚持国院优良传统，不断提升自身的综合素质和能力水平。在组织不断发展同时，个人也不断进步，希望大家在工作中能够注重实效，切实为学生会的发展做出贡献。活动提前科学规划布局，争取把各项活动做大做强。

国际学院团委学生会执行主席董奕辰在发言中，向大家展示了组织近年来所获的的成就，介绍了组织各部门的责任与工作。他以自身经验给予新成员的宝贵建议，激励着每一位干事，使他们怀揣着一颗赤子之心，热爱着我们的暨南大家庭。


学生会成员7仪式


​



大会尾声


成立大会就此圆满落下帷幕，而国际学院团委学生会也即将踏上新的征程。今天的大会仿佛一双无形的手，将团委学生会所有干事的心连接在一起，而那份凝聚力与归属感也将随时间推移越发牢固。希望国院团委学生会的每一位成员在未来的一年里继续发光发热，服务大众，将忠信笃敬的暨南精神发扬光大。



On the afternoon of November 19th, 2024, the Inauguration Ceremony of the 24th International College Youth League Committee and Student Union was grandly held in Classroom N305 of the Teaching Building on Panyu Campus of Jinan University. Song Jingsong, Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee of the International College, Yu Jiajia, Yin Qiuying, Yang Luyao, and Li Xiaoqian, counselors of the Student Affairs Office of the International College, Feng Xiaolong, the instructor of the International College Youth League Committee and Student Union, the student delegation of the International College, the presidium of the International College Youth League Committee and Student Union, the heads of various departments, and all the new student cadres attended this inauguration ceremony.



Everyone sang the school anthem together.


Leaders' Speeches


Song Jingsong emphasized that as a youth organization, the Student Union should undertake more responsibilities. It should not only focus on personal growth through experience but also attach importance to academic studies and do its own job well. In terms of the construction of the Student Union, it should "go out" more, actively learn from the outside world, make good use of alumni resources, enhance exchanges, and seek solutions to problems. The Student Union of the International College should also learn from excellent examples, adhere to the fine traditions of the International College, and continuously improve its comprehensive quality and ability level. While the organization is constantly developing, individuals should also make progress. He hoped that everyone could focus on practical results in their work and truly contribute to the development of the Student Union. Activities should be planned and arranged scientifically in advance to strive to make each activity bigger and stronger.

Dong Yichen, the Executive Chairman of the International College Youth League Committee and Student Union, in his speech, showed everyone the great achievements the organization has made in recent years and briefly introduced the responsibilities and work of each department of the organization. With his own experience, he gave valuable suggestions to the new members, inspiring every cadre and making them cherish a sincere heart and love our Jinan University family.



The Appointment Ceremony of Student Union Members


The End of the Ceremony


The inauguration ceremony thus came to a successful conclusion, and the International College Youth League Committee and Student Union is about to embark on a new journey. Today's ceremony was like an invisible hand, connecting the hearts of all the cadres of the Youth League Committee and Student Union together, and that sense of cohesion and belonging will become stronger as time goes by. It is hoped that every member of the Youth League Committee and Student Union of the International College will continue to shine and serve the public in the coming year, carrying forward the Jinan spirit of loyalty, faithfulness, earnestness, and respect.



-暨南大学国际学院融媒体中心-

-THE END-

item.description: 秋冬
item.content:encoded:
2024-12-06 23:07 广东

秋冬


大雪

Major Snow



大雪

《月令七十二候集解》说：“大雪，十一月节，至此而雪盛也。”大雪，是二十四节气中的第21个节气，冬季的第三个节气。斗指壬，太阳到达黄经255度，交节时间为每年公历12月6-8日。大雪期间，全国气温显著下降，北方冷空气越发活跃，雪代替雨成为主要降水形式。

大雪节气是干支历子月的起始，标志着仲冬时节正式开始。



今日大雪


“万树琼花一夜开，都和天地色皑皑。”白雪皑皑、银装素裹，正是滑冰与赏雪的好时节。除了专业的滑雪场和滑冰场以外，人们喜欢在结冰的河面上滑冰。比如在北京，什刹海和颐和园等历史名胜的湖泊到了冬天就变成了天然滑冰场。人们滑行于冰封的湖泊和河流之上，与自然万物相拥。"


大雪节气，很多家庭用八角、桂皮、花椒和糖等各种各样的调料做腌肉。把肉煮熟腌制几天后，再晒干保存，它将会成为春节餐桌上的佳肴之一。


“冬藏。”中医认为，在冬季吃营养丰富的食物可以帮人们熬过严寒的天气。数九寒天内，一些地区的人们吃火锅、糯米饭，喝咸菜汤、红薯粥，暖胃又暖心。



诚如伊迪丝•西特维尔所言："冬天是舒适的时候，是享用美食和温暖的时候，是亲切触摸的时候，是在火堆旁交谈的时候：是回家的时候。”让我们共同品味隆冬的独特魅力。



Major Snow

"The seventy-two " read: "Major snow falls in November, and snow become heavy.” Major Snow is the 21st solar term of the 24 solar terms and the third solar term in winter. It usually occurs on December 6-8, when the sun’s elliptical longitude reaches 255 degrees ,representing the beginning of midwinter.

Snow falls as if flowers blooming，the whole world is covered." White with snow, it is a good time to skate and admire the snow. Besides professional ski and skating resorts, people also skate on the icy river. In Beijing, for example, lakes of historical sites such as Shichahai and the Summer Palace become natural skating rink in winter. People walk on frozen lakes and rivers, embracing nature.


During Major Snow, many families use star anise, cinnamon, pepper and sugar and other spices to make pickled meat. After being cooked and marinated for several days, then dried and preserved, it will become one of the delicacies on the Spring Festival table.


"Winter is the season of nourishment." According to traditional Chinese medicine, eating nutritious food in winter can help people survive the cold weather. People eat hot pot，sticky rice，salter vegetable soup and sweet potato congee to keep warm.


As Edition Stiwell pointed out that ，"Winter is the time for comfort, for good food and warmth, for the touch of a friendly hand and for a talk beside the fire: it is time for home." Let's enjoy the glamor of midwinter .


-END-

-暨南大学国际学院融媒体中心-

item.title: 青春对话，朋辈护航｜暨南大学国际学院朋辈分享会
item.content:encoded:
2024-12-03 16:11 广东

为进一步发挥优秀朋辈的榜样引领作用，帮助同学们更好地适应和规划大学生活，解答同学们在学习和升学方面的各种疑问，我院于2024年11月14日下午在本部教学大楼312举办了本学期首场朋辈分享会。分享者是 2019级临床医学专业的苏瑾萱和张藜学姐，她们结合自己的本科学习经验和升学历程，为在场同学详细介绍了学习方法和保研流程，并就大学生涯规划等内容提供了宝贵的建议。 


内容回顾

本次朋辈分享会，两位学姐主要从保研政策与经验，大学生涯规划，竞赛与科研经验，海外学习经验等方面进行了分享，并回答了在场同学的提问。

首先进行分享的是张藜学姐。


张藜以树状图的形式简明扼要地展现了保研的流程，使同学们对保研有了一个大致的了解，接着详细地为同学们讲解了本科期间需要完成的各项工作以及夏令营所需的各项材料及获取方式，希望同学们能够有所收获。


了解到同学们对于参与科研项目，以及参加什么竞赛、如何参加竞赛的问题还存在许多疑问，张藜对此结合自身经历，为在座的同学们带来了详细的解答。张藜鼓励大家积极了解各路消息，打破信息差，积极参与竞赛和活动，过更有规划的大学生活。

接着进行分享的是苏瑾萱学姐

为了使同学们对保研流程有更加详细和深入的了解，苏瑾萱以时间轴的方式展示了保研的各个重要时间节点，详细枚举出保研所需的所有资料并细致地制作了一份各校夏令营表格。在场的同学们聚精会神地了解各项保研的注意事项，收获颇多。


接着，为了使同学们能够将上述目标落实到具体行动，苏瑾萱向同学们介绍了目标拆解法，将实现目标的过程细分为“明确目标”“拆解目标”等步骤。当大目标变成一个个小目标并在每天的实践中逐个达成，看似遥不可及的梦想也会变得触手可及。

 

最后，在同学们热烈的掌声中，本次朋辈分享会圆满结束。相信本次分享会能让同学们对保研以及自身定位有了更加清晰的认知。希望同学们能够将自身的具体情况与学姐分享的经验相结合，定下目标并为之努力奋斗！











同学们认真听讲







To further exert the exemplary leading role of outstanding peers, help students better adapt to and plan their college lives, and answer various questions that students may have regarding their studies and further education, our college held the first peer sharing session of this semester in Room 312 of the main teaching building on the afternoon of November 14th, 2024. The sharers were Senior Sisters Su Jinxuan and Zhang Li from the Clinical Medicine major of the Class of 2019. Combining their own undergraduate learning experiences and further education processes, they introduced in detail the learning methods and the postgraduate recommendation process to the students present, and also provided valuable suggestions on the planning of college careers and other aspects. 



 Content Review


In this peer sharing meeting, the two seniors mainly shared their research policies and experiences, university career planning, competition and scientific research experience, overseas study experience, etc., and answered the questions of the students present.


The first one to share was Senior Zhang Li. Senior Zhang presented the process of being recommended for postgraduate study without examination in a concise and clear way in the form of a tree diagram, enabling the classmates to have a general understanding of it. Then, she explained in detail all kinds of work that need to be completed during the undergraduate period as well as various materials required for summer camps and the ways to obtain them. She hoped that the classmates could gain something from it.


Realizing that the students still had many doubts about participating in scientific research projects, what competitions to take part in, and how to participate in them, Senior Zhang, based on her own experiences, brought detailed answers to the students present. Senior Zhang encouraged everyone to actively seek information from various sources, bridge the information gap, actively participate in competitions and activities, and lead a more planned college life.


Next to share was Senior Sister Su Jinxuan. In order to enable the students to have a more detailed and in-depth understanding of the postgraduate recommendation process, Senior Sister Su presented the various important time nodes of the postgraduate recommendation in the form of a timeline. She enumerated in detail all the materials required for the postgraduate recommendation and meticulously made a form of various summer camps of different universities. The students present listened attentively to the various precautions for the postgraduate recommendation and gained a lot.


Next, in order to enable the students to translate the above goals into specific actions, Senior Sister Su introduced the goal breakdown method to the students. She subdivided the process of achieving the goals into steps such as "clarifying the goals" and "breaking down the goals". When the big goals are transformed into small goals and achieved one by one in daily practice, the seemingly unreachable dreams will also become within reach.


Finally, in the warm applause of the students, this peer sharing session came to a successful conclusion. It is believed that this sharing session can enable the students to have a clearer understanding of postgraduate recommendation and their own positioning. It is hoped that the students can combine their specific situations with the experience shared by the senior sister, set their goals and strive hard for them!

-国际学院融媒体中心-

- - - end - - -

2024-11-30 21:12 广东

各位国际学院的小伙伴们，大家好！汉语角活动就要来啦，你们准备好了吗？


活动简介·

今年学院的汉语角的主题为中国茶文化，活动形式为大型游园摊位及表演活动， 融合品茗、赏戏、享文化开展嘉年华式的活动。意在让学子们体验中华民族丰富多彩的文化内容，并提高同学们的班级凝聚力和责任意识。




时间地点

1

活动名称

2024级国际学院汉语角之中国茶文化

2

活动时间

2024年12月7日 （星期六）早上8点30分至中午12点

3

活动地点

番禺校区西操场（原紫菜生活馆空地，T4宿舍楼西侧）



活动内容

文化表演：

同学们除了可以享受到不同的茶文化，还可以观看各种各样精彩的表演！



品茗一盏 赏千年文化：

今年特设主题为中国茶饮文化，将由2024级国际学院不同专业的同学为大家带来不同茶艺。这次活动的亮点在于我们将新式茶饮、中式茶点与传统的六大茶系结合在一起，大家既可以感受到传统茶艺的醇香，也可以体验到新式茶艺的创新，同时我们还会有精彩的节目表演，一起期待吧！


评选颁奖：

同学们可以在享受茶文化和欣赏精彩节目演出的时候进行投票评选，为你喜爱的摊位投票支持，共同见证颁奖时刻！



快来参加吧！我们期待同学们的到来哦！




Hello,everyone ！The “Chinese Corner”is coming ! Are you ready?


【Introduction】

The theme of this year's “Chinese Corner”  is Chinese tea culture. The activity takes the form of a large-scale garden party with booths and performance events. It integrates tea-tasting, opera appreciation, and cultural enjoyment to conduct carnival-like activities. The purpose is to enable students to experience the various and colorful cultural contents of the Chinese nation and enhance class cohesion and sense of responsibility among students.


【Activity Date and Venue】

Activity Name

2024 International School Chinese Corner Chinese Tea Culture


Activity Date

December 7th,2024 (Saturday) 8:30 am to 12 pm


Activity Venu

Panyu Campus West Playground Open Space(West Side of T4 Dormitory Building)


【Activity Contents】

Cultural Performances

Students can not only enjoy different tea cultures but also watch various wonderful shows !


Savor a cup of tea and appreciate the millennia-old culture

This year, the specially set theme is the Chinese tea culture. Students from different majors in the International School of 2024 will bring you different tea art performances. The highlight of this event lies in the combination of the new tea culture and the traditional tea culture. Everyone can not only experience the mellow aroma of traditional tea art but also enjoy the innovation of the new tea art. Meanwhile, there will also be wonderful program performances. Let's look forward to it together!

 

Selection and Award Ceremony

Students can vote and make selections while enjoying the tea culture and watching the splendid performances. Vote for your favorite booth and witness the awarding moment together !


Come on and join us !


—国际学院融媒体中心—

item.title: 校园事务|全国安全消防教育日
item.description: 全国安全消防教育日助力消防知识，树牢安全理念，共建安全校园。
item.content:encoded:
融媒体中心 2024-11-12 22:18 广东

全国安全消防教育日助力消防知识，树牢安全理念，共建安全校园。


全国安全消防教育日

National Safety Fire Education Day



由来

“119消防宣传日”的设立，源于公众对“119”火警号码的印象。此时正值风干物燥、火灾多发之际，全国各地都在紧锣密鼓地开展冬季防火工作。为了提高全民消防安全意识，使“119”精神更加深入人心，公安部在一些省市进行“119”消防活动的基础上，于1992年发起消防安全日，将每年的11月9日定为全国的“消防宣传日”。



01


着火措施

1、拨打火警电话“119”时，一定要沉着冷静，关键是要把情况用尽量简练的语言表达清楚。

2. 家中一旦起火，不要惊慌失措，如果火势不大，应迅速利用家中备用的简易灭火器材，采取有效措施控制和扑灭火灾。

3 .油锅着火，不能泼水灭火，应关闭炉灶燃气阀门，直接盖上锅盖或用湿抹布覆盖，令火窒息。还可向锅内放入切好的蔬菜冷却灭火。

4. .煤气罐着火，要用浸湿的被褥、衣物等捂盖灭火，并迅速关掉阀门。

5.家用电器或线路着火，要先切断电源，再用干粉或气体灭火器灭火，以防触电或电器爆炸伤人。

6.救火时不要贸然开门窗，以免空气对流，加速火势蔓延。


02


逃生事项

1.千万不要使用电梯，应从消防疏散楼梯撤离。

2.按照火灾逃生路线图或疏散指示标志逃生。

3.必须随身携带钥匙，一旦去路被堵，可以及时退回房间再寻良策。

4.在可能的情况下，逃生时一边跑一边敲门通知其他人逃生。如果有警铃开关，应立刻按动警铃报警。

5.当楼梯被浓烟或大火封堵时，不要贸然冲过去。

6.如被困于高处呼救无效时，可在窗前挥动被单、毛巾、枕套等物，引起别人注意。

7.如果门窗、通道、楼梯等被烟火封住，应充分利用救生绳、消防缓降器、救生袋等逃生。

8.住所如果离楼顶较近，可直奔楼顶平台或阳台，发出求救信号并耐心等待救援人员到来。无论遇到何种情况，都不能直接往楼下跳。


总结

消防安全是校园安全里相当重要的一环。共学消防知识，可树牢安全理念，提高安全意识，将隐患拒之门外。日常里依规行事，遇险情有序应对。它是校园和谐的保障，让知识化作守护力量，共建安全校园，为青春梦想的飞扬撑起安全晴空，促教育之花绚烂绽放。





Origin

The establishment of "119 Fire Safety Day" stems from the public impression of the "119" fire alarm number. At this time, it is a dry and fire-prone season, and fire prevention work is being carried out across the country in a tight schedule. In order to raise people's awareness of fire safety and make the "119" spirit more deeply rooted in people's minds, the Ministry of Public Security launched the "119" fire safety activities in some provinces and cities, and initiated the Fire Safety Day in 1992, designating November 9th of each year as the National Fire Safety Day. 


01


Fire Safety

1. When calling the fire emergency number "119", you must remain calm and try to express the situation as concisely as possible.

2. Once a fire breaks out at home, don't panic. If the fire is not too big, you should quickly use the household firefighting equipment available to take effective measures to control and extinguish the fire.

3. If the oil pan catches fire, don't pour water on it. You should turn off the gas valve of the stove and cover it directly with a pot lid or a wet cloth, suffocating the fire. You can also put cut vegetables into the pan to cool down and extinguish the fire.

4.If the gas cylinder catches fire, cover it with a wet blanket or clothes and extinguish it quickly.

5. If household appliances or wiring catch fire, turn off the power first and then use dry powder or gas extinguishers to put out the fire to prevent electrocution or appliance explosion injuries.

6. When extinguishing the fire, don't open the windows and doors casually, as this may cause air circulation and accelerate the spread of the fire.




02


Escape Procedures

1. Never use elevators, evacuate through the fire escape stairs.

2. Escape according to the fire escape route map or evacuation direction signs.

3.Always carry a key with you, so you can quickly return to your room if your escape is blocked.

4. If possible, while escaping, knock on doors to alert others to evacuate. If there is a fire alarm switch, press it immediately to sound the alarm.

5.Do not rush through a stairway that is blocked by smoke or fire.

6. If you are trapped on a high floor and your cries for help are not answered, wave a blanket, towel, or pillow case in front of a window to attract attention.

7. If doors, passageways, or stairways are blocked by smoke or fire, use a fire escape rope, a fire escape descent device, or a rescue bag to escape.

8.  If your living space is close to the rooftop, go directly to the rooftop platform or balcony and signal for help. Do not jump from the building.





Conclusion

Fire safety is an important aspect of campus safety. Learning fire safety together can strengthen the safety concept, enhance safety awareness, and keep safety hazards at bay. Following regulations in daily life and responding to emergencies in an orderly manner can ensure the harmony of the campus. It is the guarantee of campus safety, turning knowledge into protective power, building a safe campus together, supporting the soaring of youthful dreams, and promoting the splendid blooming of education.




END

-暨南大学国际学院融媒体中心-

-THE END-

item.content:encoded:
融媒体中心 2024-11-09 20:45 广东

传统节日|二十四节气|立冬


“天水清相入，秋冬气始交。”岁暮轻寒，青黄相融，万物归藏。立冬时节，太阳到达黄经225度，北半球日照时间将继续缩短，正午太阳高度角将继续降低，北半球获 得的太阳辐射量持续减少，各地渐次迎来雨雪降温天气，冬季伊始。


立冬，作为古时“四时八节”之一，受到古人的重视。有“天子迎冬”与“拜冬”习俗。《四民月令》记载：“冬至之日进酒肴，贺谒君师耆老，一如正日。”宋代起，暖炉会兴起，遂有“绿蚁新醅酒，红泥小火炉”之雅兴。


“立冬杀气凝，清霜会晨朝。”在我国北方地区，立冬有吃饺子以御寒的习俗。俗话说“立冬不端饺子碗，冻掉耳朵没人管。”


在我国南方地区中，江苏、浙江一带民间用各类香草、菊花、金银花煎汤沐浴，称为“扫疥”。绍兴一带，人们利用冬季水体清冽、气温低的特点，开始进行冬酿。闽南地区有“补冬”习俗。“立冬补冬，补嘴空。”人们结束最后的农事活动，以营养品进行滋补。同时制作炣饭，祭拜祖先、神明，以庆祝丰收，祈求平安。


立

冬

Beginning of 

Winter


天寒雪欲来，人们对生活的热爱却愈加熊熊燃烧。冬酿、拜冬、祭祀……种种立冬习俗，无不体现着天人合一的非凡智慧，亦凝结着人们对时节的感念与对自然的感恩。


冬季将至，顺颂时祺。


At the end of this year, it’s gradually getting cold, and leaves turned yellow. Everything return to hide.  The sun reaches 225 degrees of yellow longitude, the northern hemisphere will continue to shorten the duration of sunshine, and the northern hemisphere received a continuous reduction in solar radiation, gradually ushered in the rain and snow around the cooling weather.


The Beginning of Winter, as one of the "four seasons and eight festivals" in ancient times, was emphasized. There were the customs of "welcoming winter by the son of heaven" and "worshiping winter". Since the Song Dynasty, the custom of warming of the stove rise, so there are "green, new spirits of wine, red clay small fireplace" of the elegant.

In the northern part of China, winter has the custom of eating dumplings to protect against the coldness.While in the southern region of China, including Jiangsu, Zhejiang, folk utilize all kinds of herbs, chrysanthemum, honeysuckle to decoct bath, known as "sweeping scabies". In Shaoxing area,folk begin winter brewing. Southern Fujian region has a "make up for winter" custom."  People nourish themselves with nutritious food,Making rice, worshiping ancestors and gods to celebrate a good harvest as well as praying for peace.


While it is cold and snowy, people's love for life burns ever more fiercely. Winter brewing, winter worship and sacrifices ...... are all winter customs that reflect the extraordinary wisdom of the unity of heaven and mankind, as well as people's feelings for the seasons and their gratitude to nature.


Winter is approaching, and we wish you good luck.

END

             -暨南大学国际学院融媒体中心-

item.title: 传统节日｜“寒衣”送暖意
item.description: “十月一，送寒衣”
item.content:encoded:
2024-11-01 09:58 广东

“十月一，送寒衣”

 寒

 衣

Nov.

2024

2024.11.1


日

一

二

三

四

五

六






01

寒衣节

02

初二

七月流火 九月授衣

“十月一，送寒衣” 寒衣节，这个承载着中华民族深厚情感的传统节日，带着浓浓的思念，在秋风萧瑟中走来。


这个节日的由来可以追溯到‌周朝，当时《诗经·豳风·七月》记载“七月流火，九月授衣”，意味着农历九月开始天气逐渐转凉，人们开始为越冬添置御寒的衣服，因此寒衣节也被称为“授衣节”。到了‌宋朝时期，这一习俗被移至农历十月初一，标志着严冬的到来。


寒衣节的由来，有着各种动人的传说。其中，最广为流传的是孟姜女千里送寒衣的故事。孟姜女的丈夫被征去修筑长城，数九寒天，她心疼丈夫受苦，便亲手缝制寒衣，踏上艰辛的送衣之路。她的深情与执着，为寒衣节赋予了爱的温度。这一节日，也成为生者对逝去亲人牵挂的寄托。


在寒衣节这一天，人们会用各种方式来缅怀先人。烧寒衣是重要的习俗之一，人们把纸糊的棉衣、冥币等物品，在路口或者坟前焚烧，希望这些能为逝去的亲人送去温暖，让他们在另一个世界也能抵御寒冬。这看似简单的举动，却蕴含着深深的眷恋，是我们与逝者之间情感交流的特殊方式。


寒衣节，是一座连接阴阳两界的情感桥梁。在这个特殊的日子里，让我们怀揣着对逝者的敬意与思念，以合适的方式度过，让爱和温暖永远延续。

"On the first day of the tenth lunar month, winter clothes are sent." The Hanyi Festival, a traditional festival carrying the profound emotions of the Chinese nation, comes with deep yearning in the bleak autumn wind.


The origin of this festival can be traced back to the Zhou Dynasty. At that time, it was recorded in "The Book of Songs - Bin Wind - July" that "In the seventh month, the Fire Star passes the meridian; in the ninth month, clothes are given out", which means that the weather gradually turned cold starting from the ninth lunar month, and people began to prepare warm clothes for the winter. Therefore, the Hanyi Festival is also known as the "Clothing - Giving Festival". By the Song Dynasty, this custom was moved to the first day of the tenth lunar month, marking the arrival of the severe winter.

There are various moving legends about the origin of the Hanyi Festival. Among them, the most widely - spread one is the story of Meng Jiangnu sending winter clothes over a long distance. Meng Jiangnu's husband was conscripted to build the Great Wall. In the coldest days of winter, she felt sorry for her husband's suffering, so she sewed winter clothes by herself and embarked on the arduous journey of sending clothes. Her deep love and perseverance have given the Hanyi Festival the warmth of love. This festival has also become the sustenance of the living's concern for the deceased relatives.


On the day of the Hanyi Festival, people will use various ways to remember their ancestors. Burning winter clothes is one of the important customs. People burn paper - made cotton - padded clothes, hell bank notes and other items at crossroads or in front of graves, hoping that these can send warmth to the deceased relatives so that they can resist the cold in the other world. This seemingly simple act contains deep affection and is a special way of emotional communication between us and the deceased.


The Hanyi Festival is an emotional bridge connecting the two worlds of the living and the dead.On this special day, let us cherish the respect and yearning for the deceased and spend it in an appropriate way, so that love and warmth will last forever.

END



-暨南大学国际学院融媒体中心-


- THE END -

item.title: 铭记伟大胜利，赓续红色精神
item.content:encoded:
2024-10-25 23:01 广东

“雄赳赳，气昂昂，跨过鸭绿江。保和平，为祖国，就是保家乡……”1950年10月25日，中国人民志愿军打响入朝后的第一场战役，他们用生命捍卫国家安全与民族尊严。



第一节 纪念日的由来

（图为志愿军跨过鸭绿江）


每年的10月25日是抗美援朝纪念日。1950年，中国人民志愿军于10月25日打响了入朝的第一次战役，以光荣的胜利拉开了伟大的抗美援朝战争的帷幕，标志着抗美援朝的正式开始。1951年，党中央决定将10月25日定为抗美援朝纪念日，以表彰志愿军的牺牲和贡献，弘扬他们的英雄精神。





第二节 回顾抗美援朝历程

（图为战役中志愿军某部向敌军阵地冲击）

战争背景：1950年6月，朝鲜内战爆发，美国随即武装干涉，并派遣海军第七舰队侵入台湾海峡。美军不顾中国政府警告，越过三八线，威胁中国安全。


决策出兵：危急关头，应朝鲜党和政府请求，中共中央和毛泽东主席作出抗美援朝、保家卫国的重大决策。1950年10月19日，中国人民志愿军跨过鸭绿江，进入朝鲜战场。


五次战役：1950年10月25日至1951年6月10日，中国人民志愿军同朝鲜人民军密切配合，连续进行5次战役，五战五捷。把帝国主义侵略者从鸭绿江和图们江边赶回到三八线附近。


第二阶段：1951年6月中旬至1953年7月27日是抗美援朝战争第二阶段。在这个阶段，中朝人民军队执行“持久作战、积极防御”的战略方针，以阵地战为主要作战形式，进行持久的积极防御作战。


停战协定：1953年7月，《朝鲜停战协定》签署，标志着历时2年零9个月的抗美援朝战争宣告结束。历时近三年的抗美援朝战争取得了伟大的胜利。


在抗美援朝战争中，重要的战役、战斗有134起，平均每周有一次。志愿军共歼敌71万余人，涌现出近6000个功臣集体和30多万名英雄功臣。有197653名烈士付出了生命，他们用生命捍卫新生的人民政权，用生命写就了一部英雄史。




第三节 抗美援朝精神

（图源于网络）

抗美援朝精神，是马克思列宁主义、毛泽东思想同正义战争伟大实践相结合的产物，是人民军队宗旨、本色和作风的体现，是中华民族不畏强暴、敢于斗争的历史传统的弘扬，是中国人民极其宝贵的精神财富。


“打得一拳开，免得百拳来”，抗美援朝的伟大胜利捍卫了新生的人民政权，为新中国的社会主义建设营造了良好的国际环境，极大地提高了我国的国际地位。74年过去了，抗美援朝的影响穿越时空,抗美援朝精神始终是中国人民的宝贵财富，抗美援朝精神早已深深融入中国人的血脉灵魂，激励着我们不断走向新的胜利。


我们要铭记抗美援朝的伟大胜利，铭记新中国奋斗的历程，赓续伟大的抗美援朝精神。向英勇的志愿军将士致敬！向最可爱的人致敬！向先辈们致敬！


"Valiant and upright, we cross the Yalu River. To safeguard peace and serve our motherland is to protect our hometown..." On October 25, 1950, the Chinese People's Volunteers initiated their first battle after entering Korea, defending national security and the dignity of the nation with their lives.



The Origin of the Commemoration Day

October 25th is commemorated annually as the day of the Chinese People's Volunteers fighting in the War to Resist US Aggression and Aid Korea In 1950, on October 25th, the Chinese People's Volunteers initiated their first battle in Korea, marking the beginning of the great War to Resist US Aggression and aid Korea with a glorious victory. This victory signified the official start of the war. In 1951, the Central Committee of the Communist Party decided to designate October 25th as the Memorial Day for the War to Resist US Aggression and Aid Korea  to honor the sacrifices and contributions of the Volunteers and to promote their heroic spirit.



Reviewing the Course of Events 

【War Background】In June 1950, the Korean War broke out, and the United States immediately intervened militarily, sending the Seventh Fleet into the Taiwan Strait. Disregarding warnings from the Chinese government, the U.S. forces crossed the 38th parallel, threatening the security of China.


【Decision to Dispatch Troops】At a critical juncture, in response to the request of the Korean Workers' Party and the government, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and chairman Mao made the significant decision to resist US aggressors and aid Korea to defend the motherland . On October 19, 1950, the Chinese People's Volunteers Army crossed the Yalu River and entered the Korean battlefield.


【Five Campaigns】From October 25, 1950, to June 10, 1951, the Chinese People's Volunteers closely cooperated with the Korean People's Army and carried out five consecutive campaigns, achieving victory in each. They drove the imperialist invaders from the banks of the Yalu and Tumen rivers back to the area near the 38th parallel.


【The Second Phase】From mid-June 1951 to July 27, 1953, marked the second phase of the Wa.During this phase, the Chinese and North Korean forces implemented a strategic guideline of "prolonged warfare and active defense," with positional warfare as the primary form of combat, engaging in sustained active defense operations.


【Armistice Agreement 】In July 1953, the Korean Armistice Agreement was signed, marking the end of the War , which lasted for 2 years and 9 months. The nearly three-year-long War to Resist US Aggression And aid Korea achieved a great victory.

During the War to resist US aggression and aid Korea , there were 134 significant battles and engagements, averaging one per week. The Volunteers Army annihilated over 710,000 enemy troops and saw the emergence of nearly 6,000 meritorious collectives and more than 300,000 heroic individuals. A total of 197,653 martyrs sacrificed their lives; they defended the nascent people's government with their lives and wrote a heroic history with their sacrifices.




Great Spirit in War to Resist US Aggression and Aid Korea

The spirit of the War to resist US aggression and aid Korea is a product of the combination of Marxism-Leninism and Mao Zedong Thought with the great practice of a just war. It reflects the purpose, character, and style of the people's army. It is an affirmation of the historical tradition of the Chinese nation to stand up against aggression and dare to fight. It is an extremely valuable spiritual asset of the Chinese people.


"Landing one punch opens the way, preventing a hundred more," the great victory of the War to Resist US Aggression And aid Korea defended the nascent people's government, created a favorable international environment for the socialist construction of New China, and greatly enhanced our country's international standing. Seventy-four years have passed, and the influence of the War toResist US Aggression And aid Korea transcends time and space. The spirit of the War to Resist US Aggression And aid Korea remains an invaluable asset to the Chinese people. It has long been deeply integrated into the blood and soul of the Chinese people, inspiring us to continuously march towards new victories.

 

We must remember the great victory of the War to Resist US Aggression And aid Korea, remember the journey of struggle of New China, and carry forward the spirit of the War to Resist US Aggression And aid Korea.Salute to the heroic volunteers! Salute to  the most admirable people! Salute to our predecessors !




- END -

item.title: 纪念中华人民共和国恢复联合国合法席位73周年
item.content:encoded:
2024-10-25 23:01 广东



1971年10月25日第二十六届联合国大会以压倒性多数通过决议恢复中华人民共和国在联合国一切合法权利。


1971年11月15日，恢复合法席位后，中华人民共和国代表团首次出席联合国大会会议，代表团团长、外交部副部长乔冠华发表了讲话。


（乔的笑）



联合国背景

第二次世界大战之后，在中、美、苏、英、法等国的倡议下，联合国成立，中国是最第一个在联合国宪章上签字的国家，中国是联合国创始会员国与安理会常任理事国之一。



困难重重

1949年新中国成立后，中华人民共和国政府作为代表中国人民的唯一合法政府，本该享有联合国的合法席位，但是由于美国政府实行敌视新中国的政策，中国人民的正义要求遭到了无理阻挠。从1949年到1971年，围绕恢复中国在联合国的合法席位问题，中国政府和人民进行了长达22年的斗争。


进入20世纪60年代后，随着中国国际地位的提高和亚非拉一系列新独立国家不断加入联合国，美国的阻挠越来越困难。经过许多亚非拉国家和其他主持正义的国家的共同努力，克服种种障碍，这一问题终于得到了解决。这一斗争得到世界上越来越多的国家支持，逐渐成为联合国内主持正义的国家的共同斗争。



斗争胜利

1971年10月25日，第二十六届联合国大会就阿尔巴尼亚、阿尔及利亚等23国提出的联合提案进行表决。该提案要求恢复中华人民共和国在联合国的一切合法权利，并立即把台湾国民党当局的“代表”从联合国及其所属一切机构中驱逐出去。该提案最终以76票赞成，35票反对，17票弃权或缺席的压倒性多数通过，这就是著名的联合国第2758号决议。

（图片来源于网络）



影响意义

新中国恢复联合国合法席位，极大地提高了中国的国际地位，占世界人口四分之一的中国人民在联合国有了真正代表，揭开了中国外交史的新篇章。与此同时，有力地振奋了第三世界的国家的精神，鼓舞了第三世界的国家反对霸权主义和强权政治。


新中国重返联合国后，一直秉持着联合国宪章的宗旨和原则，积极参与国际事务、维护国际秩序，推动构建新型国际关系，推动全球治理体系的完善，推动构建人类命运共同体 。中国以实际行动彰显了负责任大国的国际形象，中国日益走近世界舞台中央、不断为人类作出更大贡献 。



拓展阅读

【三个世界】的理论

https://www.12371.cn/2022/07/13/

ARTI1657667464380136.shtml


On October 25, 1971, the twenty-sixth session of the United Nations General Assembly adopted by an overwhelming majority a resolution restoring all the lawful rights of the People's Republic of China in the United Nations.


On November 15, 1971, the delegation of the People's Republic of China attended the United Nations General Assembly for the first time after the restoration of its lawful seat, and the head of the delegation, Vice-Minister for Foreign Affairs Qiao Guanhua, delivered a speech.



Background of the United Nations

After the Second World War, at the initiative of China, the United States, the Soviet Union, Britain and France, the United Nations was established, and China was the first country to sign the Charter of the United Nations, and is a founding member of the United Nations and one of the permanent members of the Security Council.



Difficulties

After the founding of New China in 1949, the Government of the People's Republic of China, as the sole legitimate government representing the Chinese people, should have enjoyed a legitimate seat in the United Nations, but due to the hostile policy of the United States Government towards New China, the just demands of the Chinese people were unreasonably obstructed.From 1949 to 1971, the Chinese Government and people struggled for 22 years over the issue of restoring China's legitimate seat in the United Nations.

 

After the 1960s, as China's international status improved and a series of newly independent countries in Asia, Africa and Latin America continued to join the United Nations, it became more and more difficult for the United States to obstruct it.Through the joint efforts of many Asian, African and Latin American countries, as well as other countries upholding justice, and overcoming all kinds of obstacles, this issue was finally resolved.This struggle has been supported by an increasing number of countries around the world and has gradually become a common struggle of the just countries within the United Nations.



Victory in the Struggle

On October 25, 1971, the twenty-sixth session of the United Nations General Assembly voted on a joint proposal submitted by Albania, Algeria and 23 other countries.The proposal called for the restoration of all the lawful rights of the People's Republic of China in the United Nations and the immediate expulsion of the "representatives" of the Kuomintang authorities of Taiwan from the United Nations and all its organizations.The proposal was finally adopted by an overwhelming majority of 76 votes in favor, 35 against and 17 abstentions or absences, which is the famous United Nations resolution 2758.



Impact and Significance

The restoration of the legal seat of New China in the United Nations has greatly enhanced China's international status, and the Chinese people, who account for a quarter of the world's population, have been truly represented in the United Nations, opening a new chapter in China's diplomatic history.At the same time, it has lifted the spirits of the countries of the Third World and inspired them to oppose hegemony and power politics.


Since its return to the United Nations, New China has been upholding the purposes and principles of the United Nations Charter, actively participating in international affairs, safeguarding the international order, promoting the construction of a new type of international relations, promoting the improvement of the global governance system, and promoting the building of a community of shared destiny for mankind.China has demonstrated its international image as a responsible big country through practical actions, and has been moving closer to the center of the world stage and making greater contributions to mankind.



Expanded Reading

The Three Worlds Theory

https://www.12371.cn/2022/07/13/

ARTI1657667464380136.shtml




--- End ---

二十四节气——霜降
item.description: 时至秋日终，霜降柿子红。
item.content:encoded:
2024-10-23 18:15 广东

时至秋日终，霜降柿子红。

First Frost

中国 · 传统节气


古籍《月令七十二候集解》记载：“九月中，气肃而凝，露结为霜矣。”进入霜降节气，秋燥明显，冷空气南下更趋频繁，昼夜温差增大。天气逐渐变冷，露水凝结为霜，故称“霜降”。

Ancient books, "the seventy-two wait for the moon" recorded: "September in the middle, the atmosphere is clean and condensed, the dew knots for frost carry on."  Entering the frosty season, autumn dryness is obvious, cold air comes south more frequently, the temperature difference between day and night increases. T

he weather gradually become colder, dew condensation for frost, so called "First frost”


“时至秋日终，霜降柿子红。”霜降时节，柿子成熟，菊花绽放，正是赏菊登高以寄寓诗情、食柿子以御寒保暖的好时节。在广西、云南等壮族地区，每年九月晚稻收割结束后，乡民们举行霜降节以庆祝丰收、酬谢自然。It is the end of autumn, and the persimmons are red at First Frost ."At the time of First Frost, persimmons are ripe and chrysanthemums are blooming, which is a good time to appreciate chrysanthemums and climb up to the heights in order to send poetic sentiments, and to eat persimmons so as to protect oneself from the coldness. In Guangxi, Yunnan and some other Zhuang areas, after the end of the late rice harvest in September each year, the townspeople hold the Frost Festival to celebrate the harvest and reward nature.


“雪来松更绿，霜降月弥辉”“薄暮轻寒霜降近”作为秋季的最后一个节气，霜降的到来标志着秋季的渐渐远去与冬季的款款而来。

"Snow comes and the pine seems more green, frost arrives and the moon still shine." "With thin twilight light and coldness the First Frost arrived gradually." As the last of the autumn season, the arrival of frost marks the gradual departure of autumn and the coming of winter.

由物候嬗变衍生出的二十四节气是中国古代劳动人民的智慧结晶。时节流转，自然荣枯亦是世界美丽的规律。

The twenty-four seasons, which are derived from the transmutation of weather conditions, are the crystallization of the wisdom of the ancient Chinese.The flow of seasons and the glory of nature are also the laws of the world's beauty.


END

item.title: 果园校园青春跑活动火热袭来！
item.description: 校园The International School Running Event is coming!&
item.content:encoded:
2024-10-19 13:02 广东

校园The International School Running Event is coming!&

火热来袭
























果园校园青春跑活动火热袭来！今天，你run了吗?

The International School Running Event is coming! Did you run today?







前方高能





什么？

What？


你还在为课余时间没有规划而无所事事吗？

Are you still aimless because you haven’t planned your spare time?



你还在为只增不减的体重而苦苦烦恼吗？

Are you still worried about your ever-increasing weight?




快来加入果园校园青春跑活动，一起run起来吧！

Come and join the International School Running Event and let’s run together!







活动宗旨

“青春孕育无限希望，青年创造美好明天”为积极响应学校号召，丰富校园文化活动。国际学院团委特策划举办“2024年暨南大学国际学院校园青春跑活动”，旨在通过多样化的跑步形式，激发同学们的运动热情，形成健康向上的校园文化氛围。


“Youth breeds infinite hope, and young people create a beautiful tomorrow”. General Secretary Xi Jinping has high expectations for young people. In order to fully implement Xi’s important thought on youth work, the Running Event of the International School of Jinan University will be held by the Youth League Committee of Jinan University’s International School, aiming to inspire students’ enthusiasm for sports and to form a healthy and positive campus cultural atmosphere through various forms of running.





活动介绍


本次活动形式多样，分为三个部分

This event features various formats, divided into three parts




个人跑 

individual running


集体跑

group running 


特色跑

specialty running



01



个人跑

 Individual formats

A

U

T

U

M

N


个人跑

——随时随地，即刻开跑！

参与者可通过运动软件打卡记录跑步里程和时间，跑步时间和地点不做要求限制，想怎么跑就怎么跑。青春不设限，打卡随你愿！形状无关单词、汉字，甚至悄悄表个白也未尝不可~单次里程要求不少于2km，每次记为1分，每日上限1分。月度累计总跑量每10km记1分。



Individual running

----Run as you please!

Participants can use the sports app to check in and record their running mileage and duration. There are no requirements or restrictions on running time and location. You can run as you please. Youth knows no limits, and you can check in whenever you want! The shape of your running route doesn't matter – it could be words, characters, or even a confession! The minimum distance requirement for a single run is no less than 2km. Each run counts as 1 point, with a daily cap of 1 point. Monthly cumulative running distance will be scored at 1 point per 10km.



02



集体跑

 Group running

A

U

T

U

M

N


集体跑

——齐心协力，跑出风采！

一个人跑坚持不下去？

我们将于指定时间在本部或南校开展集体跑团活动，结交跑步搭子，感受热血氛围，期待你的加入！集体跑每次可获得2分（此分数不与个人跑和特色跑重叠，且参与次数不限）。



Group running

----Work together,and Run with grace!

Can't keep running alone? 

We will organize group running activities at Shipai Campus or Panyu Campus at the designated time. During the activities, you can meet fellow runners and experience the passionate atmosphere. Looking forward to your participation! For each session you can obtain 2 points (this score does not overlap with individual running and specialty running, and there is no limit to the number of participations).



03



特色跑

 Individual formats

A

U

T

U

M

N


特色跑

——惊喜连连，玩转课余！

单纯跑步太无聊？

我们将准备丰富多彩的主题跑步活动，满足你的奇思妙想，让你边跑边玩！解锁更多惊喜就请关注我们校园特色跑吧~




Specialty running

----Surprise abound, having fun after school!

Boring just running?  

We will prepare a variety of themed running activities to satisfy your wild imagination and let you have fun while running! If you want to unlock more surprises, please follow our specialty running activities~



结语


青春是由发烫的脸颊，肆意挥洒的汗水以及同伴们的彼此鼓励构成的。


Youth is composed of glowing cheeks, freely shed sweat,and mutual encouragement among peers. 


你还在等什么？一起来共赴一场热血与激情的青春盛宴吧！


What are you waiting for? Let’s

attend a youth banquet filled with passion!


更多信息可加入咨询群






















Autumn

Equinox


✦

•

✦

--- End ---

策划：

文案：陈天丽

排版：吴彤语

图片：刘玲瑀

初审：封小龙‍‍‍‍‍‍‍‍

复审：宋京松

终审：闫昕

item.title: ISLCSU |国际学院团委、学生会介绍
ISLCSU |国际学院团委、学生会介绍
ISLCSU |国际学院团委、学生会介绍
ISLCSU |国际学院团委、学生会介绍
ISLCSU |国际学院团委、学生会介绍
ISLCSU |国际学院团委、学生会介绍
ISLCSU |国际学院团委、学生会介绍
item.content:encoded:
2024-09-15 19:48 广东


ISLCSU

团委、学生会

介绍

招贤纳新，广纳贤才



总述


在国际学院党委领导与国际学院团委指导下，国际学院学生会开展各种活动。


Under the leadership of the International School Party Committee and the guidance of the International School Youth League Committee, the International School Student Union carries out various activities.


国际学院团委、学生会内有多个部门，分别是：媒体资讯部（MID）、组织部（OD）、学术与生活部（ALD）、文体部（RSD）、综合事务部（GAD）、志愿队（The volunteer team）、国院主持团队（MC team）等。


各部门分属职能各有不同，以下为大家逐一介绍，供大家对各个部门有一个初步认知。


The International School Youth League Committee and Student Union have multiple departments, including the Media and Information Department (MID), Organization Department (OD), Academic and Life Department (ALD), Cultural and Sports Department (RSD), General Affairs Department (GAD), Volunteer Team ，MC team and so on.

These departments have different functions. The following is a brief introduction of each department for you to have a preliminary understanding of each department.



国际学院学生团委


第一副书记

First Deputy Secretary 


22IET柴永昌

Chris


大胆 仔细 认真


第二副书记

Second Deputy Secretary

22CPA杨子瑜

Arthur


行有不得，

反求诸己。

扎根土地，

向阳而生。


国际学院团委负责完成学校党委、学校团委下发的各项工作任务；掌握学生思想动态，做好学生思想政治教育工作；执行、宣传党和团组织的指示和决议，充分发挥团员的模范作用，了解和反映学生的思想、要求；对团员进行教育、管理和服务；做好团的日常工作等。


The International school Youth League Committee is responsible for completing various tasks assigned by the school's Party Committee and Youth League Committee; Master the ideological dynamics of students and do a good job in ideological and political education for students; Implement and publicize the instructions and resolutions of the Party and Youth League organizations, fully leverage the exemplary role of members, and understand and reflect the thoughts and requirements of students; Provide education, management, and services to members of the group; Do a good job in the daily work of the team and so on.



国际学院学生会主席团

 

主席

 Presidium


22IJ董奕辰

Eason


光而不耀，

 静水流深。



副主席

Vice Presidium 


22CPA杨子瑜

Arthur


行有不得，

反求诸己。

扎根土地，

向阳而生。


国际学院学生会主席团主要负责统筹学生会各项活动，是学生会各个部门的主心骨，协助各个部门开展活动，为各个部门布置活动任务。


The Presidium of the Student Union of International School is mainly responsible for coordinating the activities of the Student Union, and is the backbone of each department of the Student Union, assisting each department to carry out activities and assigning activity tasks for each department.



MID·媒体资讯部



Heads of MID：

23IJC 甘佳禾 Gabby

23PHA 詹旭晨 Charles


MID主要负责国际学院活动的宣传策划，以吸引更多学生关注并参与国际学院所举办的活动。宣传策划包括宣传品制作以及其他宣传方式；同时也负责学院活动前期宣传、后续跟踪报道以及活动相关摄影工作。提供更全面和便利的线上服务和交流了解的咨询平台，满足学生会至全国院学生的需求。


Mainly responsible for the publicity and planning of international school activities, in order to attract more students' attention and participate in the activities which organized by international schools. In addition, it also responsible for the shooting of school activities and the operation of the official account of the Student Union.



OD·组织部



Heads of OD：

23CPA 孙悦阳 Justin

23FNC 陈步青 Martin

23FNC 吴悦 Juliet


OD主要负责团委相关工作，处理团务信息并向全体国际学院学生传达相关信息。推动理论学习，推动学生会的思想政治建设。


OD is mainly responsible for the relevant work of the League Committee, processing League affairs information and conveying relevant information to all international school students. 

OD promotes theoretical learning, and promotes the ideological and political construction of the Student Union.



ALD·学术与生活部



Heads of ALD：

22CST 段瑞豪 Ruihao

23CPA 罗媛 Rosemary

23FSE 谭欣然 Ivy


ALD部门的主要任务是策划和协调学术活动以及团体辅导，专注于为国院学生提供心理支持和其他辅导服务。我们本学期将开展校园青春跑，荧光夜跑和果园心情信箱。下学期将开展益童逐梦，心理话剧大赛和英语晚会等多样化活动。这些活动将进一步丰富同学们的生活，为同学们带来激情与乐趣。


ALD will plan and coordinate academic activities as well as group counseling, focusing on providing psychological support and other counseling services to National College students. This term we will carry out the Campus Youth Run, Fluorescent Night Run and Orchard Mood Mailbox. In the next semester, various activities will be held, such as Dream Pursuit, mental drama competition and English evening. These activities will further enrich the lives of students and bring passion and fun to students.



RSD·文体部



Heads of RSD：

23IJC 林浩毅 Lincoln

23CPA 欧英翰 Eric

23CM 巫晓婷 Hillary


RSD主要通过举办各类文体活动，彰显学院特色及文化，展现学院的多元性与创造性;如英语晚会、汉语角等文化类活动。同时通过举办各种体育赛事，提高国际学院学生参与体育活动的积极性；促进学生之间的交流与合作，展现国院学子的体育与团队精神；如“国际杯“篮球赛、闪避球大赛等。


RSD primarily highlights the school's characteristics and culture, showcases its diversity and creativity by organizing various cultural and sports activities,such as "English Evening" and "Chinese Corner".At the same time, it enhances the enthusiasm of international school students to participate in sports activities by hosting various sports events. It promotes communication and cooperation among students, and shows up the sport and team spirits of the students in International School, such as  "International Cup Basketball Competition" and "Dodgeball Match".



GAD·综合事务部



Heads of GAD：

23IJC庾露Luna

23IET唐星贤Toby

23PHA李政阳Lambkin


GAD是学生会里唯一的行政类部门，主要负责学生会的人力资源管理工作，进行人员考核，定期召开对点会议来协调各部门关系。并且负责与学院活动赞助商谈判的相关工作。同时举行内部培训、团委学生会成立大会等活动。


GAD is the only administrative department in the student union, mainly responsible for the human resources management of the student union, conducting personnel assessments, and regularly holding point-to-point meetings to coordinate the relationships between various departments. And GAD is responsible for negotiating with sponsors of college activities. At the same time, internal training and the establishment meeting of the student union of the Youth League Committee will be held.




The volunteer team·志愿队



Heads of the volunteer team ：

22iet皮文睿 

22IJ郑棋予


志愿队在推动学院学生参与志愿服务方面发挥了重要作用，理论志愿相结合，育人助人相促进。志愿队积极动员学院学生走出校园，服务更广泛的社会群体。他们组织多样化的志愿活动，不断丰富学生们的志愿服务体验，助力公益事业如陪伴特殊儿童、做图书管理员等。


The volunteer team has played an important role in promoting the participation of students in volunteer services, combining theoretical volunteering and promoting education and assistance. The volunteer team actively mobilizes students to step out of the campus and serve a wider range of social groups. They organize diverse volunteer activities, constantly enriching students' volunteer service experience, and assisting in public welfare undertakings such as accompanying special children and becoming librarians.


MC team·国院主持团队


Heads of MC team ：

23FNC 崔乐儿 Chary


MC team在国际学院举办的活动中承担司仪工作，包括中文主持和英语主持，现场引导、流程控制以及气氛调控，在每一场活动中扮演着至关重要的角色。


The MC team plays a crucial role in events organized by the International School, undertaking the responsibilities of hosting in both Chinese and English, guiding the event live, controlling the process, and regulating the atmosphere. They are essential in every event they participate in.


END


上述便是新一届的国际学院团委、学生会，无论您选择加入哪一个部门，相信您都可以从中获得一段难以忘怀的时光以及真挚的友谊。国际学院团委、学生会等待大家的加入！希望能在未来与您携手共进为国院书写新的篇章。

The above is the new International school Youth League Committee and Student Union. No matter which department you choose to join, I believe you can gain an unforgettable time and sincere friendship from it. The International school Youth League Committee and Student Union are waiting for everyone to join! I hope to work together with you in the future to write a new chapter for the National Academy of Sciences.

item.description: 八一建军节八一建军节他们，被称为最可爱的人。他们，把清澈的爱奉献给祖国和人民。他们，就是人民子弟兵。
item.content:encoded:
2024-08-01 23:09 浙江

八一建军节八一建军节他们，被称为最可爱的人。他们，把清澈的爱奉献给祖国和人民。他们，就是人民子弟兵。

八一建军节






八一建军节


他们，被称为最可爱的人。

他们，把清澈的爱奉献给祖国和人民。

他们，就是人民子弟兵。

在八一建军节之际，

让我们一同庆祝中国人民解放军建军97周年！


They are known as the cutest people.

They dedicate their clear love to the motherland and the people.

They are the People's Army soldiers.

On the occasion of the August 1st Army Day，

let's celebrate the 97th anniversary of the founding of the Chinese People's Liberation Army!


1

END

item.title: 2023-2024年度学院共青团先进集体和先进个人表彰
item.description: 党政通用
item.content:encoded:
传媒部·MID 2024-07-03 17:19 广东

党政通用



表彰名单


各支部：

为充分发挥各级团组织和广大团员青年的先进典型示范作用，鼓励党团干部在强国建设、民族复兴伟业中挺膺担当，结合学院工作实绩，国际学院团委决定表彰一批在2023-2024学年共青团活动中表现突出的集体和个人，名单如下：

“优秀团支部”

团组织建设工作基础扎实，联系服务紧密，模范作用成效显著。


国际经济与贸易专业2021级团支部

新闻学专业2022级团支部



 “优秀团支书”

听从指挥，踏实肯干，带领所在支部出色地完成各项工作。


2022级国际经济与贸易专业 柴永昌

2023级会计学专业 孙悦阳

2020级新闻学专业 单怡颖



 “学习先进支部”

在“青年大学习”等团组织规定学习任务中，认真、及时完成学习，学习风气好。

 

国际学院临床医学专业2023级团支部

国际学院临床医学专业2022级团支部

国际学院药学专业2022级团支部

国际学院食品科学与工程专业2022级团支部 

国际学院计算机科学与技术专业2023级团支部



“学习先进团员”


2023级临床医学专业 田洁

2022级临床医学专业 董若羽

2022级药学专业 刘行

2022级食品科学与工程专业 潘辰安

2023级计算机科学与技术专业 王博洲

2021级国际经济与贸易专业 何嘉妮

2022级新闻学专业 付元璟

2022级国际经济与贸易专业 柴永昌

2023级会计学专业 孙悦阳

2020级新闻学专业 单怡颖


希望获表彰集体和个人戒骄戒躁，继续发挥先进引领作用，为学院共青团建设发挥更大的作用。


国际学院团委

2024年7月1日
